title: Demon trident
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                           | Demon trident                    |
| :--------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms") |
| [Damage](/Weapon_damage "Weapon damage")       | 12                               |
| Accuracy                                       | +1                               |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 13 (130%)                        |
| [Min delay](/Minimum_delay "Minimum delay")    | 6 at skill 14                    |
| [Hands](/Handedness "Handedness")              | 1H                               |
| Size                                           | Medium                           |
| Ranged?                                        | No                               |

|   |                                                                 |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A terrible three-pronged weapon, moulded by fire and brimstone. |

> This weapon falls into the '[Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")' category. It is a one-handed weapon.

**Demon tridents** are the best one handed [polearms](/Polearms "Polearms"), dealing significantly more damage than regular [tridents](/Trident "Trident"). Though a demon trident is slightly weaker than a [demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") or [demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip"), their [reaching](/Reaching "Reaching") ability helps make them more desirable.

Worshippers of [good](/Good "Good") [gods](/God "God") cannot attack with them without suffering [penance](/Penance "Penance"). However, worshippers of [the Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One") can convert a demon trident into a [trishula](/Trishula "Trishula"), with better stats and the [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") brand. You can reverse the process with [Kikubaaqudgha](/Kikubaaqudgha "Kikubaaqudgha")'s or [Lugonu](/Lugonu "Lugonu")'s blessing.

## History

- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), demon tridents dealt slightly more damage than normal in the hands of [demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn") characters.
- Prior to [0.10](/0.10 "0.10"), demon tridents did 13 damage, but lacked innate [reaching](/Reaching "Reaching").

| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident]() • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |

html:
Demon trident

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Demon trident
Skill Polearms
Damage 12
Accuracy +1
Base delay (%) 13 (130%)
Min delay 6 at skill 14
Hands 1H
Size Medium
Ranged? No
A terrible three-pronged weapon, moulded by fire and brimstone.
This weapon falls into the 'Polearms' category. It is a one-handed weapon.

Demon tridents are the best one handed polearms, dealing significantly more damage than regular tridents. Though a demon trident is slightly weaker than a demon blade or demon whip, their reaching ability helps make them more desirable.

Worshippers of good gods cannot attack with them without suffering penance. However, worshippers of the Shining One can convert a demon trident into a trishula, with better stats and the holy wrath brand. You can reverse the process with Kikubaaqudgha's or Lugonu's blessing.

History

  • Prior to 0.14, demon tridents dealt slightly more damage than normal in the hands of demonspawn characters.
  • Prior to 0.10, demon tridents did 13 damage, but lacked innate reaching.
Demon trident Trishula
Image
Mundane
Magical
Artifact
"Rift"
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net

'''Demon tridents''' are the best one handed [[polearms]], dealing significantly more damage than regular [[trident]]s. Though a demon trident is slightly weaker than a [[demon blade]] or [[demon whip]], their [[reaching]] ability helps make them more desirable.

Worshippers of [[good]] [[god]]s cannot attack with them without suffering [[penance]]. You can reverse the process with [[Kikubaaqudgha]]'s or [[Lugonu]]'s blessing.
